TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualFile extends System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFileBase
Public MustInherit Class VirtualFile Inherits VirtualFileBase
public ref class VirtualFile abstract : System::Web::Hosting::VirtualFileBase

summary.span: 表示虛擬檔案或資源空間中的檔案物件。

span.span: Represents a file object in a virtual file or resource space.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別是代表虛擬檔案系統中的檔案物件的基底類別。The class is the base class for objects that represent files in a virtual file system. 一般而言，您會實作的子針對每個類別Web 應用程式中的下階的物件。Typically, you would implement a descendent of the class for each object descendent in your Web application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例類別的實作，會將資訊儲存在結合使用範本檔案來傳回 HTML 資料的物件。The following code example is a class implementation that combines information stored in a object with a template file to return HTML data. 此程式碼範例使用的程式碼範例並類別來提供虛擬資源的資料存放區載入至物件。This code example works with the code examples for the and classes to provide virtual resources from a data store that is loaded into a object. 如編譯和執行此範例中，完整的指示，請參閱 「 範例 」 一節的類別概觀。For the complete instructions for compiling and running the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此範例中有三個部分：類別實作，用來填入 XML 資料檔物件和頁面範本檔案。This example has three parts: the class implementation, an XML data file used to populate the object, and the page template file. 第一個程式碼範例會實作類別。The first code example is an implementation of the class. 其建構函式會在自訂中使用的方法要傳回物件物件。Its constructor uses a method on a custom object to return a object. 它接著會搜尋物件來擷取與所提供的虛擬檔案路徑相關的資訊。It then searches the object to retrieve the information associated with the virtual file path provided. 在 方法，它將資訊從結合與範本檔案的物件，並傳回結合物件。In the method, it combines the information from the object with a template file and returns the combination as a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#40)] 第二個範例是用來填入 XML 資料檔案傳回的自訂物件物件。The second example is the XML data file used to populate the object returned by the custom object. 此 XML 資料用來示範如何使用， ，和類別來擷取外部資料 中的資料，並不是要代表的實際執行品質的資料存放區。This XML data is used to demonstrate using the , , and classes to retrieve data from external data, and is not intended to represent a production-quality data store. ``` ``` 第三個範例是使用做為範本的虛擬檔案的文字檔案。The third example is the text file used as a template for the virtual file. 這類表示依百分比 （%） 標記之間的文字檔案中的預留位置`%file%`和`%content%`。Placeholders in the file are represented by text between percent (%) marks, such as `%file%` and `%content%`. 時間戳記用來監視快取的虛擬檔案資料的變更。Timestamps are used to monitor changes to cached virtual file data. ``` File name: %file%

%file%

%content%

Page timestamp: %pageTimestamp%
Data timestamp: %dataTimestamp%
Template timestamp: %templateTimestamp%

```

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫方法，以傳回虛擬資源的內容的唯讀資料流。
When you inherit from the class, you must override the method to return a read-only stream to the contents of the virtual resource.

param.span: 這個執行個體所表示之資源的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to the resource represented by this instance.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作擷取的虛擬檔案資訊的建構函式提供的自訂物件物件。The following code example is an implementation of the constructor that retrieves virtual file information from a object provided by a custom object. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#41)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出這是應視為檔案的虛擬資源。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that this is a virtual resource that should be treated as a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream Open() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Open () As Stream

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會將唯讀資料流傳回虛擬資源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a read-only stream to the virtual resource.

returns.span: 到虛擬檔案的唯讀資料流。

span.span: A read-only stream to the virtual file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回包含視為由檔案資料的資料流類別。The method returns a stream containing the data treated as a file by the class. 資料流是唯讀的且可搜尋 (屬性為 true)。The stream is read-only and is seekable (the property is true). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是實作結合的範本檔案中的虛擬檔案特定資訊，並傳回結合的方法。The following code example is an implementation of the method that combines virtual-file-specific information with a template file and then returns the combination. 範本檔案會快取以減少額外負荷的多次讀取檔案系統，以擷取範本檔案。The template file is cached to reduce the overhead of reading the file system multiple times to retrieve the template file. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#42)]

span.para: 衍生類別中方法必須傳回可搜尋的資料流。如果方法傳回的資料流不支援搜尋，就會擲回資料流傳遞至来寫出的資料物件。發生例外狀況，因為回應會嘗試讀取屬性，並不是可搜尋的資料流，在嘗試存取的屬性會導致例外狀況。如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。

In derived classes the method must return a seekable stream. If the method returns a stream that does not support seeking, a is thrown when the stream is passed to the object to write out the data. The exception occurs because the response tries to read the property, and on a stream that is not seekable, attempting to access the property causes an exception. For more information, see the property.
